title: Riot wrongly permabanning everyone on OCE.
body:
Myself, a few friends, and a few of their friends have recently suffered permanent bans from Riot due to "Usage of 3rd party programs", and it is impossible to get a response from anything that isn't an automated bot. Has anybody else here suffered that same problem? I'm extremely mad about this...

Just to clarify, the reason for the ban comes up as "Usage of 3rd-party programs"

replies.body: I have a friend who did use scripts a few times. I used my account in his computer afterwards, however the scripts were not active. Could this have caused a ban? My friend isn't banned, so why am I?

> [{quoted}](name=The Unseen BIade,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ha7Bn433,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-22T00:07:39.968+0000)
>
> I have a friend who did use scripts a few times. I used my account in his computer afterwards, however the scripts were not active. Could this have caused a ban? My friend isn't banned, so why am I?

This might be the reason. You should explain your situation and any additional information to Riot Games Player Support, and they can look into it further.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ha7Bn433,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-22T02:35:10.246+0000)

> This might be the reason. You should explain your situation and any additional information to Riot Games Player Support, and they can look into it further.

They refuse to listen to me. They said the case was closed, and no further replies have happened.

> [{quoted}](name=The Unseen BIade,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ha7Bn433,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-22T06:36:35.379+0000)
>
> They refuse to listen to me. They said the case was closed, and no further replies have happened.

If you'd like, you could make a post in Player Behavior & Moderation (NA) for clarification/confirmation from a Rioter:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/

3rd Party/Scripting account bans are some of the most accurate, since the detections are solid and easily actioned, they do not rely on context in the way that behaviour bans do. If support says no, it means on second look the ban was still legitimate.

Player support cannot tell you what was detected because that would also tell you and anyone you chose to share the information with what was NOT detected and thus it compromises further investigations. This is a large part of the reason you receive a macro answer.
___
So onto what could have caused this ban.

Something I see a lot of when these ban waves come out, is people who's accounts have been banned that insist whole heartedly they never used anything like 3rd party programs/scripts/hacks etc. Reasonably often they are in fact telling the truth, BUT they have shared their account with someone for whatever reason who did.

So to cover all the bases, have you ever for any reason shared your account with anyone? You are responsible for all action taken on your account, so if you shared your account with someone for any reason, and they used 3rd party programs/scripts/hacks etc. on your account, then your account will be banned for it. Account sharing is also against the ToS, and while it isn't usually actioned, it is when boosting/selling/buying or any cheats/hacks/scripts/malicious 3rd party are involved.
___
Otherwise, maybe you used something without knowing it was disallowed. Even if this is the case, your account will remain banned. 3rd party programs are very much a 'use at your own risk'.

[This is a list of some of the more common programs detailing what is and isn't allowed. Take a look through there for me.  ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt)

Are you using any peripheral programs at all? Anything that lets you use custom skins or gives you info? Riot won't ban for custom skins or harmless info, but some of the programs that offer those services also offer services that are punishable, and you will be banned for using those programs regardless of whether you were using the disallowed feature or not.
___
Without knowing the individual circumstances of your account I can't tell you if you have even the slightest chance of having your account unbanned, but in my experience it is extremely unlikely.

I've never shared my account! The only 3rd-party program i ever used was Curse Voice, which is an accepted program. I'm getting very frustrated at this and I don't know who else to ask! What am I even meant to do? Who can help?
